channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The CEO of one of Asia’s largest co-working space providers says his business has more in common with hotels
item.description: “It's a hospitality business," JustCo CEO Kong Wan Sin tells Fortune.

item.title: Trump names Warsh, Hassett as top Fed contenders, WSJ says
item.description: “I think the two Kevins are great,” he said. “I think there are a couple of other people that are great.”

item.title: Try this 30-second trick to keep your holiday spending from wrecking your credit
‘The question is really just how long it will take’: Over 2,000 gather at Humanoids Summit to meet the robots who may take their jobs someday
item.description: Researchers at McKinsey have counted about 50 companies that have raised at least $100 million to develop humanoids.

item.title: Trump says ‘starting’ land strikes over drugs in latest warning
item.description: “We knocked out 96% of the drugs coming in by water, and now we’re starting by land, and by land is a lot easier, and that’s going to start happening....

item.title: The Fed just ‘Trump-proofed’ itself with a unanimous move to preempt a potential leadership shake-up
item.description: “If I’m reading this properly, they just Trump-proofed the Fed.”

item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq end sharply lower as AI selloff puts stock market under pressure
More home buyers are using this type of mortgage. It often works against them.
Is the economy losing jobs? The Fed’s rate cut hints at bigger worries.
Tilray’s stock takes off on news of Trump's softening cannabis stance
